official_languages: {{clarify|text|=|None|date|=|August 2019}} {{NoteTag|Although there are someones argue that Japan's [[National Diet]] have not officially enacted a law stating that the official language is [[Japanese language|Japanese]], In fact only Japanese can be utilized before the court and in patent proceedings.|ref| name="houseikyokusangiin"|{{cite web|url=http://houseikyoku.sangiin.go.jp/column/column068.htm|script-title=ja:法制執務コラム集「法律と国語・日本語」|publisher=Legislative Bureau of the House of Councillors|accessdate=January 19, 2009|language=Japanese}}|</ref>|ref| name="Patent Law"|{{cite web|url=https://elaws.e-gov.go.jp/search/elawsSearch/elaws_search/lsg0500/detail?lawId=334AC0000000121|script-title=ja:特許法|language=Japanese}}|</ref>|ref| name="Court Act"|{{cite web|url=https://elaws.e-gov.go.jp/search/elawsSearch/elaws_search/lsg0500/detail?lawId=322AC0000000059|script-title=ja:裁判所法|language=Japanese}}|</ref>}}
